name: places/ChIJM9u5aaBZwokRS0jFTqWbnUg
adrFormatAddress: 248 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10010, USA

editorialSummary.text: Venerable family-owned shop for nuts & bolts, plumbing supplies, HVAC, paint & locksmith services.

originalText.text:
I forgot that places like this exist (sadly)

The store itself is well-organized, making it easy to find what I need without any hassle. The variety of products they carry is impressive, catering to both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Plus, their prices are competitive, and the quality of their merchandise is top-notch.

Another standout feature is their fantastic customer service. The team goes above and beyond to ensure customer satisfaction.

Kudos!

originalText.text:
The best! I had tricky elevator keys to duplicate. Nobody could make them. One locksmith made such a bad job he had to reimburse me. I was exhausted going to so many locksmiths, then I found Warshaw. The keys are perfect, smooth, and for half the price.
Really the best!

text.text:
The best! I had tricky elevator keys to duplicate. Nobody could make them. One locksmith made such a bad job he had to reimburse me. I was exhausted going to so many locksmiths, then I found Warshaw. The keys are perfect, smooth, and for half the price.
Really the best!

originalText.text: This is the way hardware stores used to be, family run, chock a block with every hardware item you could need.  Great for browsing.  We’ve been coming here for years since we moved into Gramercy Park in the 80’s. And for service, forget about Home Depot or Lowe’s.  They just drilled a hole in a stainless steel plate saving me a trip to a metal fabricator in Brooklyn.  They did it in the store.  It took all of five minutes.  Can’t beat that.

text.text: This is the way hardware stores used to be, family run, chock a block with every hardware item you could need.  Great for browsing.  We’ve been coming here for years since we moved into Gramercy Park in the 80’s. And for service, forget about Home Depot or Lowe’s.  They just drilled a hole in a stainless steel plate saving me a trip to a metal fabricator in Brooklyn.  They did it in the store.  It took all of five minutes.  Can’t beat that.

originalText.text: Great local hardware store with friendly service and a better selection of hard to find items than neighboring hardware stores.

text.text: Great local hardware store with friendly service and a better selection of hard to find items than neighboring hardware stores.

originalText.text: When I got home at 5:46 our house cleaner told me that she accidentally made a hole in the bathroom sink drain pipe. I removed the damaged L-fitting and dashed 5 blocks to Warshaw Hardware before they closed at 6. They graciously let me in at 5:55, found the correct replacement fitting, cut it to size, noticed that I needed a reducer and provided one, then let me pay with ApplePay. I've lived in the neighborhood for 24 years and only visit Warshaw Hardware when something is broken. Everytime I visit they are unfailingly thoughtful, knowledgeable, helpful and kind. My wife is so happy that I was able to fix the sink before she got home. Thanks a million Warshaw Hardware! I can't recommend these guys highly enough!
